content: lion brand pattern # 10546-c *cwetq-mossstitchafghan pdf* skill level easy level 2 wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 *wheat* 7 balls for throw 8 balls for afghan one ball is used for fringe optional crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm worked in 4-row pattern knit version moss stitch afghan knit 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/moss-stitch-afghan-knit
